name: Ophiomancer
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.
flavor:
"There are dark, ancient arts that fascinate even me."
—Sorin Markov
originalText: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, put a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Ophiomancer’s ability checks if you control a Snake at the beginning of each upkeep. If you do, the ability won’t trigger.
If the ability does trigger, but you control a Snake when it tries to resolve, the ability will do nothing. No Snake token will be created.
Ophiomancer’s ability considers any creature you control with the creature type Snake, not just the tokens Ophiomancer creates.
